title: Last Day of Love: A Teardrop Story (Teardrop #0)
description: Storyline: Last Day of Love: A Teardrop Story (Teardrop 0.5) Don't miss this beautiful original digital story by Lauren Kate, the #1 New York Times bestselling author of the Fallen series, set in the romantic world of Teardrop, a place of devastating secrets and dark magic . . . a world where everything you love can be washed away.
author: Lauren Kate
